value.title: No Joke: Google's AI is Smart Enough To Understand Your Humor
value.excerpt: Amid a flurry of new hardware including the Pixel 7, the Pixel Buds Pro and a new Pixel Tablet, Google dropped one development at its I/O developer conference that went largely unnoticed: its AI can now understand jokes.

value.title: Trump’s voice is still very much being heard
value.excerpt: Former President Donald Trump's influence is currently having a resurgence. Candidates he has endorsed are winning key GOP primaries. Candidates he had not endorsed are still swearing fealty to him. And he may soon get an important bullhorn back: The mute button placed on him by Twitter may be lifted.

value.title: Create video subtitles with Amazon Transcribe using this no-code workflow
value.excerpt: Subtitle creation on video content poses challenges no matter how big or small the organization. There is no machine learning (ML) or code writing required to get started.
